document_data.name: Sahtyra's Lane
document_data.mainbody: '''Sahtyra's Lane''' was a road paved in hard-packed dirt and [[gravel]], that stood on the boundary line of the city of [[Waterdeep]]'s [[Waterdeep/Southern Ward|Southern Ward]] and [[Waterdeep/Trades Ward|Trades Ward]].
document_data.Geography: This road stretched northwest out of [[Caravan Court]], curved westward into a straight lane, and then terminated on the east side of the [[High Road (Waterdeep)|High Road]].
